mapper.select: select table_schema ,TABLE_NAME ,CREATE_TIME as '创建时间',TABLE_COMMENT as '描述' from information_schema.tables

select TABLE_SCHEMA AS '数据库名',TABLE_NAME as '数据库表',COLUMN_NAME as columnName, IS_NULLABLE as '可为空',DATA_TYPE as '数据类型',CHARACTER_SET_NAME as '编码格式', COLUMN_TYPE as '数据类型详情',COLUMN_KEY as '主键',COLUMN_COMMENT as columnDescription from information_schema.columns where table_schema = #{databaseName} and table_name = #{tableName} ;
